trans-unit.source: Provides a server control to display a randomly selected advertisement on a mobile page.
trans-unit.target: 提供伺服器控制項，以在行動網頁上顯示隨機選取的廣告。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The AdRotator class uses the same configuration file as the Web Forms <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> class.
trans-unit.target: AdRotator 類別使用相同的組態檔做為 Web Form<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>

trans-unit.source: The AdRotator mobile control exposes many of the same properties and events as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName> control, plus it adds mobile capability.
trans-unit.target: AdRotator 行動控制項不僅會公開的相同的屬性和事件中的當做許多<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName>控制項，再加上它加入行動裝置的功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The displayed advertisement changes whenever the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理頁面時，就會變更顯示的廣告。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A> property specifies the location of an XML file that contains advertisement information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>屬性指定的 XML 檔案，其中包含通知資訊的位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: This file must reside within the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個檔案必須位於應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, XML files should be in the App_Data folder, which is configured to not allow users direct access to XML files.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性考量，XML 檔案應該在 App_Data 資料夾中，設定為不允許使用者直接存取 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A> property is empty, the AdRotator control generates a single break tag as a placeholder.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>屬性是空的 AdRotator 控制項便會產生單一中斷標記做為預留位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you do not want to display an advertisement.
trans-unit.target: 當您不想要顯示的廣告時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName> mobile control exposes many of the same properties and events as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName> control, plus it adds mobile capability.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName>行動控制項不僅會公開的相同的屬性和事件中的當做許多<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName>控制項，再加上它加入行動裝置的功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Occurs each time an advertisement is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 每次顯示廣告，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A> property is set, this event occurs after the advertisement has been selected from the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>屬性設定，就會發生此事件之後已從檔案選取公告。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs> property that contains the properties of the advertisement being displayed.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式會接收<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs>屬性，其中包含顯示廣告的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the properties that provide information specific to this event.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個事件特有的屬性，提供的資訊。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties%2A>|Returns the dictionary that contains all the advertisement properties extracted from an XML file after the AdCreated event is raised.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>|Specifies the alternate text and ToolTip (if supported by the browser) to be rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.ImageUrl%2A>|Specifies the image to be rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.NavigateUrl%2A>|Specifies the URL reference that the browser navigates to when the advertisement is clicked.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties%2A>|傳回包含所有 AdCreated 事件引發之後，從 XML 檔擷取的通告屬性的字典。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>|指定的替代文字和工具提示 （如果瀏覽器支援） 來呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>控制項中。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.ImageUrl%2A>|指定要呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>控制項中的映像。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.NavigateUrl%2A>|指定當按一下廣告時瀏覽器瀏覽的 URL 參考。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the XML file that contains advertisement data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含廣告資料的 XML 檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The file format and file name restrictions conform to those described for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 檔案格式和檔案名稱限制符合所描述的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The path to the XML file containing the properties of the advertisements to render in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AdRotator" name="AdRotator" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含要轉譯的廣告內容的 XML 檔案的路徑<xref uid="langword_csharp_AdRotator" name="AdRotator" href=""></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, XML files should be placed in the App_Data folder, which is configured to not allow users direct access to XML files.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性考量，XML 檔案應該放在 App_Data 資料夾中，設定為不允許使用者直接存取 XML 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for the control developer to override the standard <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會提供控制項開發人員覆寫標準的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the element name from which the image URL is retrieved from an advertisement.
trans-unit.target: 傳回影像 URL 擷取自廣告的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "ImageUrl".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是"ImageUrl"。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The element name from which the image URL is retrieved for an advertisement.
trans-unit.target: 影像 URL 抓取公告的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a category keyword that you can use to filter advertisements from an advertisement file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可用來篩選從廣告檔案的分類關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A> property has data and this KeywordFilter property has content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator> control selects an advertisement with a matching keyword.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>屬性有資料，而且這個 KeywordFilter 屬性有內容，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>控制項選取相符的關鍵字與公告。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A> property has data and this KeywordFilter property has content but there is no keyword match between this property and the file, a blank image displays and a trace warning is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>屬性有資料，而且這個 KeywordFilter 屬性具有內容但沒有這個屬性與檔案之間關鍵字相符、 空白的影像顯示及追蹤會產生警告。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdvertisementFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The keyword used to identify advertisements within a specific category.
trans-unit.target: 關鍵字，可用來識別特定類別內的公告。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the element that contains the target URL.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含的目標 URL 的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: You can use [\<Choice>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements to override this setting to show alternate URLs for the advertisement.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)覆寫此設定可顯示廣告的替代 Url 的項目。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element in the XML file that contains the target URL.
trans-unit.target: 包含目標 URL 的 XML 檔案中的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdCreated"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator.AdCreated"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別可以覆寫此方法以執行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use other criteria to filter how an advertisement is chosen by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator> control, or you can record the advertisement for billing purposes.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可以使用其他準則來篩選廣告會根據<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>控制項，或您可以記錄計費的公告。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs"> </xref>物件，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Renders the control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯用戶端上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that contains the output stream to render.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>物件，其中包含要呈現的輸出資料流。
